message.name: ERR_RELATEDCONCEPT_XRV_CODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A related concept, %1s, with this Code already exists.

message.name: ERR_RELATEDCONCEPT_XRV_TERM_CODE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A term, %1s, with this Code already exists.

message.name: ERR_RELATEDCONCEPT_XRV_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A related concept with Name, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_RELATEDCONCEPT_XRV_TAXONOMY_TERM_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED_CANNOT_ADD
message.locale: The term(s), %1s, are already associated to this related concept, %2s.

message.name: ERR_RELATEDCONCEPT_FV_CODE_CANNOT_CONTAIN_WHITE_SPACE
message.locale: The Code, %1s, must not have spaces.
